I am a student.
I want to be a marine biologist.

participant_2.background:
I am taking college and hoping to be a teacher.
I am a huge ed sheeran fan.
I run to relieve stress.
Poker is my favorite card game.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1, I'm a student at [university] and I'm majoring in biology. What about you?
Hi, nice to meet you! I'm participant_2, I'm also a student at [university] and I'm majoring in education.
Cool! Do you want to be a teacher?
Yeah, I've always wanted to be a teacher. I love working with kids and I think it would be a great way to make a difference in the world.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great teacher. What are some of your favorite things to do for fun?
I love to run, listen to music, and play poker.
I like to run too! I also like to read and watch movies.
Oh, I love reading too! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I especially like historical fiction and mysteries.
Oh, I love historical fiction too! I've been reading a lot of historical fiction about the Roman Empire lately.
That sounds really interesting! I've never read any historical fiction about the Roman Empire.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
